memory: Connection timeouts in Prisma/Postgres serverless environments can often be mitigated by increasing connectionTimeoutMillis (e.g., to 10s) and idleTimeoutMillis (e.g., to 15s) in the pg.Pool configuration.

Prisma transactions holding connections for long-running operations (like heavy syncs) are susceptible to connection pool exhaustion; retry logic should explicitly catch timeout exceeded and Connection terminated errors.
